tasks.title: Create Comprehensive AI Settings Page
tasks.description: Develop a complete AI settings page with provider status monitoring, model configuration, API key management, cost tracking dashboard, and performance metrics with real-time indicators.
tasks.details:
Implement the AI Settings page with the following components:

1. Provider Status Monitoring:
   - Create status cards for Ollama, Claude, and LM Studio
   - Implement real-time status indicators (green/yellow/red)
   - Set up auto-refresh functionality every 30 seconds

2. Model Configuration:
   - Create dropdown selectors for available models per provider
   - Save configuration preferences to localStorage
   - Display model capabilities and limitations

3. API Key Management:
   - Build secure input fields with masked display
   - Implement validation for API key format
   - Add save/update functionality

4. Cost Tracking Dashboard:
   - Create usage charts per provider
   - Implement historical cost tracking
   - Add filtering by date range

5. Performance Metrics:
   - Display response times
   - Show token usage statistics
   - Track success/failure rates

Backend Requirements:
- Create 5 API endpoints:
  - `/api/ai/status`: Returns current status of all AI providers
  - `/api/ai/models`: Lists available models per provider
  - `/api/ai/config`: Handles saving/retrieving configuration
  - `/api/ai/usage`: Provides usage statistics
  - `/api/ai/cost`: Returns cost data per provider

Frontend Implementation:
- Use AlpineJS for reactive components
- Maintain blue & gold theme consistency with existing UI
- Implement responsive layout for all screen sizes
- Create 3 provider status cards with toggle switches
- Build model selection panel with provider-specific options
- Design API key management panel with secure input handling
- Develop cost tracking charts with Chart.js
- Create performance metrics display with auto-updating data
tasks.testStrategy:
1. API Endpoint Testing:
   - Use Postman or similar tool to verify all 5 endpoints return correct data
   - Test error handling with invalid requests
   - Verify authentication requirements

2. UI Component Testing:
   - Verify all UI elements render correctly across browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
   - Test responsive layout on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
   - Confirm theme consistency with existing dashboard

3. Functionality Testing:
   - Verify real-time status indicators update correctly
   - Test auto-refresh functionality works every 30 seconds
   - Confirm API key masking functions properly
   - Validate model selection dropdowns populate with correct options
   - Test localStorage persistence by refreshing page and changing browsers
   - Verify cost tracking charts display accurate data

4. Integration Testing:
   - Test end-to-end workflow from configuration to usage tracking
   - Verify changes in provider status reflect correctly in UI
   - Confirm cost data updates based on usage

5. Performance Testing:
   - Measure page load time with all components
   - Test auto-refresh impact on performance
   - Verify chart rendering performance with large datasets

subtasks.title: Create Provider Status Monitoring Component
subtasks.description: Develop status cards for Ollama, Claude, and LM Studio with real-time indicators and auto-refresh functionality.
subtasks.details: Create three status cards with provider logos, current status indicators (green/yellow/red), and toggle switches for enabling/disabling each provider. Implement auto-refresh functionality that checks status every 30 seconds using the /api/ai/status endpoint. Use AlpineJS for reactive updates and maintain blue & gold theme consistency.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test status indicator changes based on API responses. Verify auto-refresh functionality works correctly. Ensure toggle switches properly enable/disable providers. Test responsive layout on multiple screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Implement Model Configuration Interface
subtasks.description: Create dropdown selectors for available models per provider with configuration storage and capability display.
subtasks.details: Build model selection panel with dropdown menus for each provider showing available models. Fetch model data from /api/ai/models endpoint. Implement localStorage saving of selected models. Display model capabilities and limitations in an expandable info panel. Ensure UI is responsive and maintains theme consistency.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify model dropdowns populate correctly from API. Test localStorage saving and retrieval of preferences. Ensure model capability information displays correctly. Test responsive behavior on different devices.

subtasks.title: Develop API Key Management System
subtasks.description: Build secure input fields for API keys with masked display, validation, and save functionality.
subtasks.details: Create secure input fields for each provider's API key with masked display (show/hide toggle). Implement client-side validation for API key format. Add save/update functionality that communicates with the /api/ai/config endpoint. Include visual feedback for successful saves and validation errors. Ensure proper security handling of sensitive data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API key validation with valid and invalid formats. Verify masking functionality works correctly. Test save/update operations with the backend. Ensure proper error handling and user feedback.

subtasks.title: Create Cost Tracking Dashboard
subtasks.description: Implement usage charts and historical cost tracking with date range filtering for each provider.
subtasks.details: Develop cost tracking charts using Chart.js to visualize usage data per provider. Implement historical cost tracking with data from /api/ai/cost endpoint. Add date range filtering functionality (daily, weekly, monthly views). Create summary cards showing total costs and usage trends. Ensure responsive design for all chart components.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify charts render correctly with different data sets. Test date range filtering functionality. Ensure calculations for cost summaries are accurate. Test responsive behavior of charts on different screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Build Performance Metrics Display
subtasks.description: Create interface for displaying response times, token usage statistics, and success/failure rates.
subtasks.details: Implement performance metrics section with gauges and charts showing response times, token usage statistics, and success/failure rates. Fetch data from /api/ai/usage endpoint. Create auto-updating displays that refresh with new data. Include comparative metrics between providers. Design responsive layout that works on all screen sizes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test metrics display with various data scenarios. Verify auto-updating functionality works correctly. Ensure calculations and data representations are accurate. Test responsive layout on multiple devices.

subtasks.title: Develop Backend API Endpoints
subtasks.description: Create the five required API endpoints for AI provider status, models, configuration, usage, and cost data.
subtasks.details: Implement five RESTful API endpoints: /api/ai/status for provider status, /api/ai/models for available models, /api/ai/config for configuration management, /api/ai/usage for usage statistics, and /api/ai/cost for cost data. Include proper error handling, authentication checks, and data validation. Document API responses for frontend integration.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each endpoint with valid and invalid requests. Verify correct data formatting and error responses. Test authentication requirements. Benchmark endpoint performance under load.

subtasks.title: Implement Responsive Layout and UI Components
subtasks.description: Create responsive layout for the AI settings page with consistent styling across all components.
subtasks.details: Implement responsive grid layout for the AI settings page using Tailwind CSS. Ensure blue & gold theme consistency with existing UI. Create navigation tabs for different sections (Status, Models, Keys, Costs, Performance). Design mobile-friendly interface with appropriate breakpoints. Implement loading states and error handling for all UI components.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test responsive behavior across multiple devices and screen sizes. Verify theme consistency with existing UI. Test navigation between different sections. Ensure loading states and error handling work correctly.

subtasks.title: Integrate and Test Complete AI Settings Page
subtasks.description: Connect all components together and perform comprehensive testing of the entire AI settings page.
subtasks.details: Integrate all components (status monitoring, model configuration, API key management, cost tracking, performance metrics) into a cohesive AI settings page. Connect frontend components to backend API endpoints. Perform end-to-end testing of all functionality. Fix any integration issues. Optimize performance and ensure smooth user experience across all features.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct end-to-end testing of complete workflow. Test all components working together. Verify data consistency across different sections. Perform cross-browser testing. Test performance under various network conditions.
